product.title: The Printed Bucket Hat in White
product.body_html: Make the most of your summer bucket list with this bucket hat. Made from organic cotton, it features a colourful yet delicate all-over pattern that can be paired with effortless outfits to make the best out of the sunny days. 56.7cm circumference.
